MAN.TITLE: mps2linpro
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: convert lp problem given in MPS format to linpro format

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : either a character string, path of the MPS file, or an mps data structure returned by readmps
: a linpro data tlist with following fields:
: real matrix (dimension (mi + md) x n) (If no constraints are given, you can set C = [])

: (column) vector of lower-bounds (dimension n). If there are no lower bound constraints, put ci = []. If some components of x are bounded from below, set the other (unconstrained) values of ci to a very large negative number (e.g. ci(j) = -(% eps)^(-1).
: (column) vector of upper-bounds. (Same remarks as above).
: number of equality constraints (i.e. C(1:mi,:)*x = b(1:mi))

DESCRIPTION.P: mps2linpro forms Linear programing data compatible with linpro out of MPS data format.
